      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">

          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Reaction between zinc and copper chloride</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Reaktion zwischen Zink und Kupferchlorverbindung</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Réaction entre le zinc et le chlorure de en 
cuivre</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Reação entre o zinco e o cloreto do cobre</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Reazione fra zinco ed il cloruro del rame</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αντίδραση μεταξύ του ψευδάργυρου και του χλωριδίου 
χαλκού</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Reacción entre el cinc y el cloruro del cobre</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This diagram demonstrates the oxidation of zinc and the reduction of copper chloride when they are reacted with each other forming copper powder and zinc chloride.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">chemical reactions</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">copper</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">copper chloride</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Oxidation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">powders</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">redox reactions</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Reduction</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">solutions</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">zinc</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">zinc chloride</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses Diagramm zeigt die Oxidation des Zinks und 
die Verkleinerung der kupfernen Chlorverbindung, wenn sie mit einander
kupferne Puder- und Zinkchlorverbindung bildend reagiert werden.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ce diagramme démontre l'oxydation du zinc et la 
réduction de chlorure de cuivre quand elles sont mises à réagir 
avec l'un l'autre formant le chlorure de cuivre de poudre et de zinc.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este diagrama demonstra a oxidação do zinco e a 
redução do cloreto de cobre quando são reagidos com se que dá 
forma ao cloreto de cobre do pó e do zinco.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo schema dimostra l'ossidazione di zinco e la
riduzione del cloruro di rame quando sono reagite con a vicenda che 
forma il cloruro di rame dello zinco e della polvere.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">_ αυτός διάγραμμα κατα:δεικνύω ο οξείδωση ψευδάργυρος
και ο μείωση χαλκός χλωρίδιο όταν αυτός είμαι αντι:δρώ με 
μεταξύ τους διαμορφώνω χαλκός σκόνη και ψευδάργυρος χλωρίδιο.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Este diagrama demuestra la oxidación del cinc y 
la reducción del cloruro de cobre cuando se reaccionan con uno a que 
forma el cloruro de cobre del polvo y del cinc.</string>
          </description>
